column3:
ようこそ ようこそいらっしゃい勇者サマ！
森のことなら マカマカにおマカせデスよ！
デクの樹サマと お話したいなら
ここを登っていってくだサイね！
column4:
Welcome, Mr. Hero! 
We're so excited you're here!

If you need to know anything about
these woods, just ask Maca!

Or you can climb up here if you want to
speak to the Great Deku Tree.

column3: もっとおマカせデスか？

このコログの森の見どころは何といっても
デクの樹サマと剣の台座デスよ！
見どころ なんて言っちゃうと
怒られちゃうかもデスが…
デクの樹サマの中には勇者サマのために
寝る場所や役立つものを用意してるデスよ！
あとは剣の台座！言わずとしれた退魔の剣が
ささっている場所デス
実は剣の台座はこの森の中心でもありまシて…台座に立って ぐるっと見回すと 
森の中の道が ほぼ分かるデスよ！
目印に豆のランプもあるので それを頼りに
進んでみるのも いいかもデス
というわけで もし道に迷ったら
剣の台座まで戻ってみるといいデスよ！
column4:
The highlights here in Korok Forest
are the Great Deku Tree and the
sword pedestal, of course! 
Although the Great Deku Tree probably isn't very
happy about becoming a tourist trap.We've really decked out the inside of 
the Great Deku Tree in anticipation of
your arrival.
You'll find a place to rest and a bunch of
other useful things in there!

And then there's the sword pedestal! The
sword that seals the darkness, which
needs no introduction, rests there.
The sword pedestal is the center of the
forest...If you stand on the pedestal and look
around, you'll be able to understand
most of the paths in the forest!
The bean lamps act as landmarks. You'll
want to familiarize yourself with them to
make it easier to find your way around.
And if you get turned around, you can
always head on back to the sword
pedestal!

column3:
アナタだけの退魔の剣…
やっと出会えましたデスね
アナタじゃない他の人が出会わないように
ワタシたち がんばりましたデスよ
迷いの森迷いましたデスか？ア！"迷わなかったから ここにいるのデスよね
しっけいしっけい デス！
column4:
The sword that seals the darkness...
To be wielded by you and you alone...
You've finally found it!
We worked really hard to make sure no
one else stumbled upon it.

How did you like the Lost Woods?
Did you get...lost?Well, you obviously made it through,
because you're here!

column3:
森から出たいデスか？ そりゃ やっぱり
いつかは出たいデスよね…
実は そんなこともあろうかと
用意しているのデスよ！
剣の台座から東の方に進むと
右手に看板があるのデス 
そこから さらに右手の坂をのぼれば
おばけの樹があるデスよ
樹の口に入ったら ぽわーんと森の外へ
行けるように しておいたのデス
迷いの森を もっかい歩くの大変かなって
思ったわけデスよ！ えへん！
column4:
You want to leave the forest?
But why? It's perfect here!

Just kidding! I know you have to leave
sometime. You've got to save Hyrule!

If you head east from the sword
pedestal, there will be a sign on your
right.
Climb up the hill on the right side of the
sign, and you'll see an ogre tree.

If you walk into that tree's mouth,
you'll *whoosh* be taken to the entrance
of the woods.
We set it up this way because even us
Koroks don't like to walk through the
Lost Woods if we can avoid it.

column3:
森のことで困ったら
マカマカにおマカせくださいデスよ！
column4:
If you have trouble with anything in
these woods, just ask Maca!

column3:
ア！勇者サマ！
退魔の剣抜くところ見てましたデスよ！
剣のこと もっと知りたかったら
マカマカに おマカせデスよ！
column4:
Ah! Mr. Hero! I was watching you pull out
the sword!

If you want to know more about the
sword, leave it to Maca!

column3:
退魔の剣…マスターソードについてデスね
おマカせくだサイ
マスターソードは特別な剣デスが
使ううちに力が弱ってしまいマス
そんな時はあわてずさけばず
復活するのを待つといいデス
剣の力が必要な いざという時のために
力を蓄えているのかもデスね
デクの樹サマなら
他のことも知ってるかもデス
column4:
The sword that seals the darkness...
You want to know more about the
Master Sword?
Well, the Master Sword is a very special
weapon, but it can lose its power if you
overuse it.
When that happens, don't panic. All you
have to do is wait for its power to
regenerate.
I probably wouldn't use it for trivial
things like opening bottles or cans.
Just for smiting evil and stuff.
The Great Deku Tree can tell you more.

column3:
アッ勇者サマ……！！
ずっとずっと待っていましたデスよ！
column4:
Whoa, he's finally here!
I...I've been waiting so long!

column3: さあ剣の元へ行くデスよ！
column4: Go on then. Go to the sword!
